sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gnome-utils package contains gnome-system-log, gnome-character-map, gnome-calculator, gnome-search-tool, gnome-dictionary, archive-generator, gfloppy and gdialog.

sect3.title: gnome-system-log
sect3.para: gnome-system-log allows you to monitor and view system log files.

sect3.title: gnome-character-map
sect3.para: gnome-character-map allows you to select characters from a table and insert them into your applications.

sect3.title: gnome-calculator
sect3.para: gnome-calculator is a simple mathematical and scientific calculator that includes arithmetic, trigonometric and logarithmic functions.

sect3.title: gnome-search-tool
sect3.para: gnome-search-tool allows you to search for files on your system using simple and advanced search options.

sect3.title: gnome-dictionary
sect3.para: gnome-dictionary allows you to look up definitions and spelling of words.

sect3.title: archive-generator
sect3.para: archive-generator creates archives from collections of files and folders using gzip compressed archive files.

sect3.title: gfloppy
sect3.para: gfloppy formats floppy disks under Linux.

sect3.title: gdialog
sect3.para: gdialog displays dialog boxes from shell scripts.
